CustomField.formula: IF( MONTH( Forecasted_Logical_Decommission_Date_Sor__c ) = 12, DATE( YEAR( Forecasted_Logical_Decommission_Date_Sor__c ), 12, 31 ), DATE( YEAR( Forecasted_Logical_Decommission_Date_Sor__c ), MONTH ( Forecasted_Logical_Decommission_Date_Sor__c ) + 1, 1 ) - 1 )
CustomField.label: Forecasted Logical Decommission Date
